builder.Name: BUILDER
builder.Description: Building on ROBLOX is not exactly like putting Lego bricks on top of each other, although at first glance it may seem so. Your skills as an architect and your commitment are remarkable!
builder.Instructions: Send your builds to the channel <#964831751979540490>.

scripter.Name: SCRIPTER
scripter.Description: 'Be a scripter' they said... 'It will be easy' they said... This achievement serves to testify to your dedication and commitment to scripting.
scripter.Instructions: Send your scripts to the channel <#964831751979540490>.

gfxer.Name: GFXer
gfxer.Description: Bringing roblox to another program is not so obvious, you have given vent to your creativity by creating one or more GFX, we respect your skill!
gfxer.Instructions: Send your GFX to the channel <#964831751979540490>.

animator.Name: ANIMATOR
animator.Description: Your hands are able to animate your creations, it is never an easy job, it requires patience and a good eye.
animator.Instructions: Send your animations to the channel <#964831751979540490>.

3d_modeller.Name: 3D MODELLER
3d_modeller.Description: Everything in your hands is like clay ready to be shaped, it takes enormous attention to detail to accomplish this work.
3d_modeller.Instructions: Send your templates to the channel <#964831751979540490>.

ui_designer.Name: UI DESIGNER
ui_designer.Description: A highly sought-after skill that requires a keen eye for detail and organization, this work is crucial even for the most basic systems.
ui_designer.Instructions: Send your UI to the channel <#964831751979540490>.

event_winner.Name: EVENT WINNER
event_winner.Description: Whether you beat the competition, or you won by a hair' breadth, it doesn't matter! You've reached the top spot in one of the events officially hosted by Quaerit and that's all that matters.

developer_of_the_week.Name: DEVELOPER OF THE WEEK
developer_of_the_week.Description: Could you be a next developer in Quaerit? Maybe with this achievement you will get noticed more...
developer_of_the_week.Instructions: Win the Developer of the week role.

lend_a_helping_hand.Name: LEND A HELPING HAND!  (Collaboration)
lend_a_helping_hand.Description: What a gentleman, whether you have collaborated for an event, for a project, sponsoring us or in any other way the Quaerit thanks you!
lend_a_helping_hand.Instructions: Contribute to the growth of Quaerit, become a partner or collaborator.

1_up.Name: 1-UP! (Boosted)
1_up.Description: Emit an aura of generosity from every corner now our discord is more sparkling than ever, thanks for the boost!
1_up.Instructions: Boost Nitro to the official Quaerit server.

sold.Name: SOLD! (First Bought)
sold.Description: You bought your first commission, we are glad to have helped you with anything you asked for!

is_this_a_habit_of_yours.Name: IS THIS A HABIT OF YOURS?
is_this_a_habit_of_yours.Description: You have ordered enough commissions that we have reason to deduce that in your hands reside only objects manufactured by the Quaerit...

verified_staff.Name: VERIFIED STAFF
verified_staff.Description: Help us moderate the server and all operations to the name of Quaerit, welcome as a member of staff!

joined_the_team.Name: JOINED THE TEAM!
joined_the_team.Description: Welcome to the Developer Quaerit team, here you will be able to refine your development skills and help us in our projects.

sheriff_of_the_west.Name: SHERIFF OF THE WEST!
sheriff_of_the_west.Description: With the fastest revolver on this side of Mississippi, you managed to win the 2022 Wild West themed contest!
